alert.note: Alert for Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 5:39PM EDT until June 13 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 439 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Crestview, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Fox Hill, Alpine Heights, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Eucheeanna, Pleasant Ridge, New Home, Argyle and Mossy Head. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
